abilities.name: Magma Armor
abilities.effect: Camerupt ex can't be Asleep or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Searing Flame
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Eruption
attacks.effect: Each player discards the top card of his or her deck. This attack does 60 damage plus 20 more damage for each Energy card discarded in this way.
